;;;;;;;;;;;;;; emacs commands
(define first (d-GetCommandKeypress)) (define second (d-GetKeypress)) (define command (lambda () (d-GetUserInput (string-append first ", " second) "Undefined combination." "OK") ))
(define cancel (lambda () (d-GetUserInput first "Cancelled." "OK") ))
(cond ((equal? first "<Control>x") (cond ((equal? second "s") (set! command d-Save)) ((equal? second "k") (set! command d-Close)) ((equal? second "<Control>g") (set! command cancel)) )) ((equal? first "<Control>c") (cond ((equal? second "<Contro>g") (set! command cancel)) )) ) (command)
